title: Arabian Halloween Night
description:
“...Give yourself to me. If you won’t, I’ll tease you all night.”

Shiori, who came to Tokyo from the countryside, is shopping in Shibuya on a bustling Halloween night. There, a foreigner named Rashid helps her escape from a con man. As thanks for his kindness, Shiori agrees to grant him three wishes...but for some reason, it feels very romantic?

At first, she doesn't believe Rashid, who claims to be a prince, but maybe... he's a real prince?!

This won't just be a one-night stand! ♪

A dreamlike love story with a foreign prince!

matches.title: Chippai-chan wa Kedamono ni Amakami sareru
Koi suru Tsubaki wa Shoya ni Saku
My Husband Dotes on Me Day and Night
There's a Lie in this Infatuation
Kimi wa Seiya ni Uso wo Tsuku
Mousou OL wa Incubus to xxx Shitai
